name: Ravox
tag_list: facebook-app, social-shopping, facebook-store, facebook-shop, social-buying, how-to-use-facebook-for-your-business, facebook-commerce, sign-up-to-facebook-as-a-business, leverage-facebook
overview:
Ravox offers a platform that can set up a business for social success by reshaping social selling around what matters most: friends of fans. Ravox gives small businesses options that when combined, lead to an effective social media marketing system.

Ravox is a distributed social ecommerce platform giving sellers, business owners and vendors free Facebook stores, valuable marketplace access, and connections to Social Affiliates eager to promote products to a large number of friends and fans.

The unique social storefront gives small businesses the opportunity to reach new audiences and social networkers to directly monetize more followers and traffic. Stores are completely customizable and flexible to your brand.

After creating a free Facebook store, businesses have the option to list products within the Ravox Marketplace, which is seen by thousands of Facebook users interested in purchasing and sharing new products. It is also equipped with social sharing capabilities that extend beyond Facebook into Twitter and Pinterest to encourage the highest social buzz.

In order to attract new customers and increase purchases even more, Social Affiliates with large numbers of friends and followers can promote products on their news feed, through email or any other social channel in exchange for a 7% commission for every sale traced to networking activity.

Ravox is on a mission to unite brands with shoppers and networkers in order to increase social sales. Through the use of technology and social media, Ravox enables businesses to connect with real people. Whether or not you use Ravox to create a free Facebook store and sell products, join the growing marketplace or earn commission as an affiliate, you can be certain Ravox is on top of the latest social ecommerce trends giving you the ability to effectively leverage Facebook and increase social sales.
